titles: By the King. A proclamation, for a publick general thanksgiving, throughout the realm of Scotland.
author: Scotland. Sovereign (1649-1685 : Charles II)
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.
publisher: Printed by Evan Tyler, printer to the King's most excellent Majesty,
notes: Royal arms at head of text; initial letter.
Dated at end: Given at Our Court at Whitehall, the tenth day of June, and of Our Reign the seventeenth year.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
